ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: they denied him and so they will be among those arraigned -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They denied him, and will surely be brought to punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But they denounced him as a liar, so they will surely be arraigned (for punishment),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They called him a liar. Thus, all of them will suffer torment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In response they denied him, so they will surely be brought forth as captives.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But they denied him, so they will certainly be brought forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But they called him a liar, therefore they shall most surely be brought up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But they cried him lies; so they will be among the arraigned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But they denied him, so they surely will be haled forth (to the doom)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but they rejected him, and thus will certainly be called to account;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they belied him, so verily they are to be brought up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: they impugned him. So they will indeed be mustered [in hell]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they rejected him, and they will certainly be called up (for punishment),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But they denied him [Iliyas (Elias)], so they will certainly be brought forth (to the punishment),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But they belied him, so they will be among the arraigned (in Hell),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they called him a liar, and thus they will be brought forward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:127] But they denied him. So they will indeed be arraigned, in the Fire,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But they denied him) they denied his message, (so they surely will be haled forth (to the doom)) they will be brought in order to be tormented in the Fire,
